title: Our church - portrait of a parish
creator_credit: King Squire Films, Canadian Broadcasting Corporation, Roberta King and Ronald Squire
brief_description: Film of parish life spoken by the Minister and parishioners young and old. Details births and marriages, town fair and parade and fundraising. As with all parishes worldwide, money is always a problem. The church was built in 1885 and renovated inside in 1970.
creator_credit_for_label: King Squire Films, Canadian Broadcasting Corporation, Roberta King and Ronald Squire
